cast.name: 安娜·谢尔比尼娜 Anna Sherbinina
谢尔盖·波波夫 Sergei Popov

introduction: A story of adoption told without glamour and hypocrisy that usually accompanies this topic. Anna is a top model, who was adopted by a French couple as a child. She returns to her hometown with a charity mission from France. A story of an orphan turned princess becomes a legend in her native provincial town. Anna gets treated like royal person and everyone expects miracles from her. Anna is confused and cannot understand what all these people want from her. She is used to a calm and logical western lifestyle. Her home is France, in Russia she is a guest. Horrified, she watches her photographer boyfriend Michelle, admire incomprehensible Russian mentality.
